page.title: 17A VISIT TO WEST THURROCK
page.content: We went to visit West Thurrock and on the way we were shown an old railway line as we were passing Mill Lane. Then we went to the lakeside Development and were shown where the chalk had been dug away about five or six years ago.We also saw the cement works where some factories have been closed down for a long time.Then we stopped at Pilgrims Lane,we were shown the levels of chalk and the tracks where the railway had once been.The Sand Martins had built their nests in the holes of the sand.Then we were shown a path which lead to marshy land and we saw some wild orchids and some teasles.We looked over the cliff and saw that the trees had taken over the pit.
